method: 1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
2. Arrange the tortilla chips in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet.
3. Sprinkle the shredded cheddar cheese evenly over the tortilla chips.
4. Top with diced tomatoes, sliced black olives, and chopped green onions.
5. Bake in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
6. Remove from the oven and serve immediately with sour cream, guacamole, and salsa.
7. Grab a cozy spot on the couch, dig in, and enjoy your Lazy Day Nachos!
